target: I agree! I mean, who would think that post american revolution males would turn to cheerleading?!
context: <user> So how do you feel about cheerleading? <system> I find it fascinating to learn that cheerleading began in the United States rather than in Germany. <user> Did it? That's really cool! <system> Yes, and apparently it's very popular with over a million people doing it. <user> I can see that. Also, the first cheerleaders were men. Looks like women cheerleaders were overlooked until the 1940s <system> I've learned that it all started with a rebellion of some male students. <user> Hahaha what? <system> It's true! Apparently there was some really bad treatment from teachers so the male students rebelled!<user> That's amazing! <system>
